name: Don't Drop The Potion
description:
As a Wizard, you must not drop the potion! Complete tasks to create the potion while holding onto it the entire time.

Instructions: WASD to move, Hold G to grab a Potion, Press E to grab Ingredients, Hold F to Prepare ingredients at Workstation. Once Potion is complete, press E on the Table near the Door.
